net.floodlightcontroller.core.module

类 FloodlightModuleLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.module.FloodlightModuleLoader

  • public class FloodlightModuleLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Finds all Floodlight modules in the class path and loads/starts them.
    作者:
    alexreimers

    • 方法详细资料

      • getModuleNameMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IFloodlightModule> getModuleNameMap()
        Gets the map of modules and their names.
        返回:
        An UNMODIFIABLE map of the modules and their names.

      • getModuleList

        public java.util.List<IFloodlightModule> getModuleList()
        Gets the list of modules in the order that they will be/were initialized
        返回:
        An UNMODIFIABLE list of loaded modules, or null if not initialized.

      • getConfigFileURI

        public static java.net.URI getConfigFileURI()
        Return the location of the config file that was used to initialize floodlight. If no config file was specified (i.e. floodlight was configured from the default resource), then the return value is null.
        返回:
        location of the config file or null if no config file was specified

      • loadModulesFromConfig

        public IFloodlightModuleContext loadModulesFromConfig(java.lang.String fName)
                                               throws FloodlightModuleException
        Loads the modules from a specified configuration file.
        参数:
        fName - The configuration file path
        返回:
        An IFloodlightModuleContext with all the modules to be started
        抛出:
        FloodlightModuleException

      • loadModulesFromList

        public IFloodlightModuleContext loadModulesFromList(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> configMods,
                                           java.util.Properties prop)
                                             throws FloodlightModuleException
        Loads modules (and their dependencies) specified in the list
        参数:
        configMods - The fully-qualified module names
        返回:
        The ModuleContext containing all the loaded modules
        抛出:
        FloodlightModuleException

      • runModules

        public void runModules()
                throws FloodlightModuleException
        抛出:
        FloodlightModuleException

      • isStartupModules

        public boolean isStartupModules()

      • setStartupModules

        public void setStartupModules(boolean startupModules)
